description: Introducing amFilm Premium HD Clear (Invisible) Screen Protectors for the original Apple iPad 2/3/4 and iPad with Retina Display (Not compatible with iPad Air/iPad 5)amFilm Premium HD Clear Screen Protectors are specifically designed to fit the original Apple iPad 2, iPad 3 and iPad 4 and iPad with Retina Display series. Made from superior quality 3-layer PET film, these screen protectors will effectively protect your screen from daily scratches, dust and scrapes, without distorting the natural colors or HD resolution of your device. With self-adhering surface, the film is designed for easy application and zero-to-minimal bubbles during application. A squeeze card is also included to remove the occasional bubble easily.Works with:Apple iPad 2, iPad 3 and iPad 4 (iPad with Retina Display)Note: Not compatible with iPad Air or iPad 5, Search ASIN: B00G5N0ZZQ for screen protector for iPad Air iPad 5 on Amazon.Contains:2xScreen Protector , Micro-Fiber Cleaning Cloth, Squeeze cardColor:HD Clear (Invisible)Application:Each of the screen protectors contain 3 layers of PET film. The first and last films are mask films, where the stickers are affixed. The actual screen protector for your device is the film in the middle. Please use the stickers to remove the mask films (NOT the stickers themselves).Warranty:30-Day Money Back GuaranteeLifetime Replacement Warranty
title: amFilm Premium HD Clear (Invisible) Screen Protectors for Apple iPad 4/3/2 and iPad with Retina Display (2-Pack) with Lifetime Warranty (NOT for iPad Air/iPad 5)
